original_text: Then Memucan said in the presence of the king and the officials, “Not only against the king has Queen Vashti done wrong, but also against all the officials and all the peoples who are in all the provinces of King Ahasuerus.
korean_text: 므무간이 왕과 지방관 앞에서 대답하여 이르되 왕후 와스디가 왕에게만 잘못했을 뿐 아니라 아하수에로 왕의 각 지방의 관리들과 뭇 백성에게도 잘못하였나이다

sentences.original_text: Then Memucan said in the presence of the king and the officials,
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 메무간이 왕과 고관들 앞에서 말하였습니다,

sentences.original_text: Not only against the king has Queen Vashti done wrong,
sentences.korean_translation: 왕후 바스디가 왕에게 잘못한 것은 물론이고,

sentences.original_text: but also against all the officials and all the peoples
who are in all the provinces of King Ahasuerus.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 아하수에��� 왕의 모든 지방에 있습니다.
